author: Special Correspondent
text:
A multi-specialty medical camp was organised at Palayamkottai on Saturday as part of the birthday celebrations of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

A team of doctors, nurses and paramedics from a few hospitals here participated in the medical camp, inaugurated by Mayor E. Bhuvaneshwari.

Over 1,200 patients were screened by the doctors from various departments for a range of ailments and those who required further medical attention for complete cure were either referred to the Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital or to a private hospital here.

In the medical camp organised by Tuticorin Medical College Hospital at Boldenpuram and Kandasamypuram in Tuticorin, a team of 50 doctors screened 1,394 patients.

Mayor A.P.R. Antony Grace inaugurated the camp. Resident Medical Officer J. Silas Jebamani led the doctors’ team from TMCH.

The next medical camp will be organised at Poobalarayapuram on February 24.
title: Medical camps as part of Chief Minister’s birthday celebrations
